name: Questrade
0:
”Alexa, ask Questrade what is my account balance?”
”Alexa, ask Questrade how my investments are doing?”
”Alexa, ask Questrade what are today's market hours?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: questrade
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Join Canada’s fastest-growing online brokerage. Get information about your investments with voice-enabled commands.

You can ask about:

 • The performance of your accounts and overall portfolio
 • Updates on your individual stocks and options
 • Order statuses
 • Market and business hours
 • Information about opening and funding an account
 
DISCLOSURE
The information accessible is more limited than the information available through the website or through your statement, and is not an official record for the brokerage account(s) to which it applies.

We provide you with data and information under license from third parties. We accept no liability for any Information provided by third parties and make no representations or warranties that such Information will be accurate or timely.

By downloading using this app, you consent to future updates and upgrades. You can withdraw your consent at any time by deleting/unlinking the app.
